text: ki tum ise (moosa ko) sandooq mein rakhakar sandooq ko dariya mein daal do phir dariya use dhakel kar kinaare daal dega ki moosa ko mera dushaman aur moosa ka dushaman (phiraun) utha lega aur mainne tum par apanee mohabbat ko daal diya jo dekhata (pyaar karata) taaki tum meree khaas nigaraanee mein paale pose jao
